class.name: TransactionQuery
class.description: The TransactionQuery class allows constructing queries for fetching transactions from the Torii indexer, supporting filtering by caller addresses, contract addresses, entrypoints, block range, model selectors, and transaction hashes.

method.name: caller_addresses
method.description: Sets the caller addresses to filter by.

method.name: contract_addresses
method.description: Sets the contract addresses to filter by.

method.name: entrypoints
method.description: Sets the entrypoints to filter by.

method.name: from_block
method.description: Sets the starting block number for the query.

method.name: model_selectors
method.description: Sets the model selectors to filter by.

method.name: to_block
method.description: Sets the ending block number for the query.

method.name: transaction_hashes
method.description: Sets the transaction hashes to filter by.
